data.SOURCE:
@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'BSID'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}
define view entity YI_PYM_DDL_BSID
  as select from I_JournalEntry            as bkpf
    inner join   I_OperationalAcctgDocItem as bseg on  bseg.CompanyCode        = bkpf.CompanyCode
                                                   and bseg.AccountingDocument = bkpf.AccountingDocument
                                                   and bseg.FiscalYear         = bkpf.FiscalYear                                                   
{
  key bseg.CompanyCode,
  key bseg.Customer,
  key bseg.SpecialGLTransactionType,
  key bseg.SpecialGLCode,
  key bseg.ClearingDate,
  key bseg.ClearingJournalEntry,
  key bseg.AssignmentReference,
  key bseg.FiscalYear,
  key bseg.AccountingDocument,
  key bseg.AccountingDocumentItem,
      bseg.DueCalculationBaseDate,
      bseg.CashDiscount1Days,
      bseg.PostingDate,
      bseg.DocumentDate,
      bseg.DebitCreditCode,
      bseg.AccountingDocumentType,
      bkpf.AccountingDocCreatedByUser,
      @Semantics: { amount : {currencyCode: 'CompanyCodeCurrency'} }
      bseg.AbsoluteAmountInCoCodeCrcy, //dmbtr
      bseg.CompanyCodeCurrency,      
      @Semantics: { amount : {currencyCode: 'TransactionCurrency'} }
      bseg.AbsoluteAmountInTransacCrcy, //wrbtr
      bseg.TransactionCurrency,
      @Semantics: { amount : {currencyCode: 'AdditionalCurrency1'} }
      bseg.AbsltAmtInAdditionalCurrency1, //dmbe2
      bseg.AdditionalCurrency1,
      @Semantics: { amount : {currencyCode: 'AdditionalCurrency2'} }
      bseg.AbsltAmtInAdditionalCurrency2, //dmbe3
      bseg.AdditionalCurrency2,
      bseg.DocumentItemText,
      bseg.PaymentMethod,
      bseg.PurchasingDocument,
      bseg.PaymentBlockingReason,
      bseg.PaymentTerms,
      bseg.BusinessArea,
      bkpf.AbsoluteExchangeRate,
      bkpf.OriginalReferenceDocument,
      bkpf.ParkedByUser,
      bkpf.IsReversal,
      bkpf.IsReversed,
      bkpf.DocumentReferenceID
}
where
      bseg.FinancialAccountType       =  'D'
  and bseg.ClearingJournalEntry       =  ''
  and bseg.AccountingDocumentCategory <> 'D'
  and bseg.AccountingDocumentCategory <> 'M'
/*+[internal] {

[],

"ANNOREF_EVALUATION_ERROR":""
}
